Context:
The students of the School of Media and Performing Arts at George Brown College will broadcast their live performances on YouTube in June 2021. Donations to the COVID-19 Student Emergency Relief Fund are requested instead of admission fees for these performances. The fund supports students who have experienced financial hardships due to the pandemic. Donors will receive a tax receipt for donations of $20 or more via email. For more information on making a donation or other ways to support, contact Gabriella Goutam at gabriella.goutam@georgebrown.ca or 416-415-5000 ext. 3289. For questions about the Love and Information play, contact Cindy.Bautista@georgebrown.ca. The George Brown College Foundation manages the fund and 100% of donations go to the fund.

Contact Information:
- Gabriella Goutam: gabriella.goutam@georgebrown.ca, 416-415-5000 ext. 3289
- Cindy Bautista: Cindy.Bautista@georgebrown.ca

Event Information:
- Performances will be broadcast live on YouTube in June 2021
- Donations requested instead of admission fees for performances

Donation Information:
- COVID-19 Student Emergency Relief Fund
- Supports students studying at George Brown College who have experienced financial hardships due to the pandemic
- 100% of donations go to the fund
- Tax receipts sent via email for donations of $20 or more.
